title: Palimpseste "Sacre"
medium: oil and mixed media on canvas
credit_line: Gift of Sara M. Winokur and James L. Winokur
provenance_text:
Georges Noël [1924-2010], Paris, France; Galerie Facchetti, Paris, France [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1962 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 291, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Galerie Facchetti.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International as a gift of Mr. and Mrs. James L. Winokur, Pittsburgh, PA. Payment was sent to the Institute's French representative on November 17, 1961. The painting was accessioned on February 15, 1962.
